reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that certain information is collected to provide the service or support requested.
reply.reference: We need to collect certain information about you to provide you with the Service or support you request. The type of information we collect varies depending on how you access and use our Service. You can also choose to voluntarily provide information to us. Below we describe the types of information we collect and where we collect it from. URL: https://pingoo.app/privacy-policy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: Account information, transactional information, log information, browser type, language preference, time zone, referring site, date and time of requests, connection information, IP address, log-in and log-out times, device-specific information, geolocation information.

content: Referring site and date and time of requests
Connection information like ISP or mobile operator

reply.analysis: The app collects various types of data such as account information, transactional information, log information, browser type, language preference, geolocation information, among others, as outlined in the privacy policy.
reply.reference: Account information. We collect the information you provide when you sign up for a Pingoo account...information such as a credit card number, billing address, and full name. Log information...details of how you used our service, like your search queries, clicks...Browser type...Language preference and time zone...Referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request...Connection information like ISP or mobile operator...Internet Protocol (IP) address...Log-in and log-out times. Device information...hardware model, operating system version, device identifiers like IDFA and UDID, and mobile network...Geolocation information...use your IP address to generate a general approximation of where you are located. URL: https://pingoo.app/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app declares the purpose of data collection and use, including information about how the collected data is utilized and shared.
reply.reference: We may process data for any other purpose disclosed to you in connection with the Service from time to time. If we intend to process your personal data for a purpose other than that set out above and which is not compatible with the original processing purpose, we will provide you with relevant information prior to such processing and will obtain your consent where necessary. URL: https://pingoo.app/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of receiving promotional email messages from Pingoo at the time of information collection by following the provided instructions. However, opting out may impact the user's use of the services. Users can still receive non-promotional communications even after opting out.

reply.analysis: The policy clearly states that users have the option to opt out of promotional email messages from Pingoo, showing that users can indeed choose to not have their data collected for promotional purposes.
reply.reference: You may receive promotional email messages from Pingoo when you first interact with the Service or by making a request to us. You can opt out of receiving promotional email messages from Pingoo at the time we collect your information by following the instructions on screen, in those email messages, or by changing your notification settings in your Pingoo account. Opting out of receiving communications may impact your use of the Services. If you decide to opt out, we will still send you non-promotional communications, such as digital receipts and messages about your account or our ongoing business relations. URL: https://pingoo.app/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties under specific circumstances.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app shares information with third parties under certain conditions with the user's consent, for external processing, to respond to legal requests, and compliance with applicable laws. This indicates data sharing with third parties.
reply.reference:
Pingoo shares your information in the following circumstances:
- With your consent. We will share personal information with companies, organizations, or individuals outside of Pingoo when we have your consent to do so.
- For external processing. Pingoo provides personal and non-personal information to our partners, trusted organizations, vendors, and other affiliated organizations to process it on our behalf.
- To respond to legal and other requests and to prevent harm.

URL: https://pingoo.app/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: Pingoo shares data with companies, organizations, or individuals outside of Pingoo with user consent, external processing partners, and for legal requests.

content: Companies, organizations, or individuals with user consent

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that Pingoo shares data with third parties based on user consent, for external processing, and in response to legal requests.
reply.reference: Pingoo shares your information in the following circumstances: With your consent. We will share personal information with companies, organizations, or individuals outside of Pingoo when we have your consent to do so. For external processing. Pingoo provides personal and non-personal information to our partners, trusted organizations, vendors, and other affiliated organizations to process it on our behalf. To respond to legal and other requests and to prevent harm. Pingoo will share all categories of personal information with companies, organizations, or individuals outside of Pingoo if we have a good-faith belief that access, use, preservation, or disclosure of the information is reasonably necessary. URL: https://pingoo.app/privacy-policy
